channel.title: Error while attacking a player
channel.description: guys idk what happened but now after few attacking turns the attacker gets this ang get dced: [code] [client-1-Brutal k0]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 0 ms] Error with player 1, Brutal k0 java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1 at client.rangeGFXNPC(client.java:2991) at client.Attack(client.java:6272) at client.process(client.java:17019) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Game saved for player Brutal k0 ClientHandler: Client Brutal k0 disconnected (localhost) Connection from localhost:2319 [client-1-Brutal k0]: Loading Process Completed [Has powers, lag: 16 ms] [/code] any 1 have any idea of what is happening?

item.title: Error while attacking a player
item.dc:creator: @moparclient moparclient
item.description:
@moparclient wrote:

guys idk what happened but now after few attacking turns the attacker gets this ang get dced:

[client-1-Brutal k0]: Loading Process Completed  [Has powers, lag: 0 ms]
Error with player 1, Brutal k0
java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -1
        at client.rangeGFXNPC(client.java:2991)
        at client.Attack(client.java:6272)
        at client.process(client.java:17019)
        at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:270)
        at process.run(process.java:23)
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
Game saved for player Brutal k0
ClientHandler: Client Brutal k0 disconnected (localhost)
Connection from localhost:2319
[client-1-Brutal k0]: Loading Process Completed  [Has powers, lag: 16 ms]

any 1 have any idea of what is happening?

Read full topic
